name: Quietly Observing (V)
Lore: 'On her assignment to kill Sharad Hett, Aurra used her patience and cunning to help track down the Jedi Master.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. Once per game, may deploy Bluffs from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Bluffs gains [Light Side Force] and [Dark Side Force]. Once per battle, may deploy a bluff card (if it is a character or vehicle) as a ''react.'' To reveal a bluff card, opponent must first use X Force, where X = 4 - number of bluff cards. (Immune to Alter.)',
